column1: The '''Grubb Family''' was an important and wealthy family of the [[Shire-hobbits]].
Female members of that family married into the [[Baggins Family|Baggins]] and [[Boffin Family|Boffin families]]. [[Laura Grubb]] married [[Mungo Baggins]]
Some of the family were involved in auctioneering. The company [[Messrs Grubb
column2: Grubb and Burrowes]] was set to sell [[Bilbo Baggins]]'s belongings.<ref>{{H|Stage}}</ref>

column1: The name is meant to recall the English verb grub "dig
